title: Reported Speech - Questions 1
instructions: Put the sentences into reported speech.
exa:
What did you go?
He asked me what I had done.

contents.longsent: How long do I have to stay here?
alters: how long he had to stay there.

contents.longsent: Who is going to stand in for you while you're away?
alters: who was going to stand in for me while I was away.

contents.longsent: What did you do last summer?
alters: what I had done last summer.

contents.longsent: Who the hell are you waiting for?
alters: who the hell I was waiting for.

contents.longsent: Which bus takes me to Boston?
alters: which bus took him to Boston.

contents.longsent: What did you buy in the shops?
alters: what she had bought in the shops.
